website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, well-built model with features that rival larger models.
pros: A compact unit that is easy to use and clean
cons: Only has a capacity for 8 hot dogs, but its design and price make up for this limitation

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I give it four stars - because, everyone knows, putting them on the grill is the only way to get five. But, this beats microwaving or boiling them, by far. I do have to turn the temp up to max, and then about 25 minutes of waiting after that. The "bun warmer" concept on the top of it will only do just that... warm them. And just a little bit. But let's face it... when you open your fridge, and you see relish... you know that hot dogs are the only logical and realistic way that you are going to be able to eat it. Sweet relish... dill relish... doesn't matter. Makes you think of hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made and doesn't turn hot dogs
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the other low reviews before I bought this. The coupling that turns the rollers does not match or hold the gear tightly enough for the rollers to turn consistently. This results in hot dogs being burned on one side and uncooked on the other. The rollers are difficult to turn as well. Combined, this is just a cheaply made product that anyone should be ashamed to sell.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Quick and tasty.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great hot dog and sausage cooker. The taste is much better than either boiling or frying the meat. They really taste like cooked at the ball park. I sometimes put frozen hot dogs on directly from the freezer. I like the bun warmer but it tends to dry the buns out a bit. I would suggest warming them when the hot dogs are half way cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Conley W.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap, my hot dogs don’t roll, my buns got hard, wish I could return it after using it but I don’t think that would be right. Paid allot of money and wanted my grandkids to enjoy it but they were disappointed as much as I am. This sucks....!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: do not waist your money on this
customer_reviews.text: i just trying to make hot dog like the convenient stores and gas stations. maybe I just had a defective one. but the rollers would not turn and hog dogs were charcoal on one side. I tried several ideas to make it work. the machine is now in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL W. MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Uneven cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Works decent. As others stated, for best results for the bun warmer, wrap buns in aluminum foil. It does not cook evenly, with my unit, I have to move the front to the back and the back to front to get even cooking. Also, the grease tray is a joke. The grease escapes through the screws that hold the plastic piece to the metal and it drips down and makes a mess on the counter. Was very disappointed with this. I personally won't buy it again or recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage. Doesn’t even work! Waste of money... it takes about 3-4 hours to cook the hotdog.
customer_reviews.author: arpa hovasapian

customer_reviews.title: Cool design. Easy to use and clean. Super Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: No regrets here. Turn it on, leave some sausages on and forget about it. Good for rendering out the fat slowly, if you like a nice crunchy casing this will work nicely. Leave some buns on the top, they'll be nice and toasty by the time you come back. Takes about 10-15 minutes to cook some on high heat, depending on thickness but it warms up pretty fast and cleaning up is simple.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Hotttt Dogggg
customer_reviews.text: My family just love cooking our hotdogs on this gadget, we love the way it spins to cook. Placing the buns in the top warms them up also it makes the buns toasty. Just like at the movies. The gas station down the road from me has the same exact one. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Velvetskin

customer_reviews.title: Cool Looking
customer_reviews.text: There is no denying that this hot dog grill looks really cool. It does it what it was intended to do and my dogs snap after I grill them. Easy to use and clean. Glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I hosted a backyard "drive-in" movie night and wanted to capture the fun of "old concession stands". The reviews previously submitted were mixed. However, I have to say, this was a very good buy and exceeded my expectations. Very easy to both put together and clean. Following the previous tips about pre-heating the roller, being attentive to the "size" of the hot dog or sausage that I placed on the machine, I was well prepared to adequately cook for our event. I pre-cooked the 1/4 lb. dogs and Italian sausages before putting them on the roller. It's not the fastest way to cook hot dogs/sausage. But it provides a gr-8 ambiance and good tasting food!
customer_reviews.author: msclaynsc

customer_reviews.title: Hot Dog Roller & Bun warmer
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. Wasn't heating up enough & rollers were not rolling properly. Going to invest in a better one .
customer_reviews.author: Randys GSD Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped for!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, easy to clean. The bun warmer is a bit of a lie. I’ve taken to just sticking the bag of buns into the tray (They dry out if they’re not wrapped in plastic or foil). If you put it on max heat and walk away do too long it’s going to overcook your dogs, but on medium for just a little longer they’ll be better. Even the dark ones are still good. The drip tray seems to have been designed to be covered in foil for easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's "man cave" 2 months ago and thought it was going to collect dust. I was wrong! We use it all the time and everyone who comes over asks if they can make a hot dog. Only issue we have is the front rollers get hotter than the back so you may need to rotate the dogs. Not a big deal for us.
customer_reviews.author: MissCammyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and easy to assemble,gets hot hot on max..hot enough to grill the dogs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!used it for my family movie night it gave my dogs that grill flavor
customer_reviews.author: Ebonie wooten

customer_reviews.title: Slow cooks
customer_reviews.text: The bun warmer just sort of dries out the buns but it does warm them. I took 20 minutes to do 4 bacon wrapped dogs. would probably take less without the bacon. Just like the movies otherwise and a nice product
customer_reviews.author: DTAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Love mine easy to use and the best hot dogs ever
customer_reviews.text: my wife asked for a hot dog cooker so i went on amazon and i got this so glad i did it is the best and easy to use and they come out so good easy to clean and setup is easy also
customer_reviews.author: Larry Webb

customer_reviews.title: Rolled Hot Dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is our second hot dog roller. They make really good hot dogs. Our first one lasted a long time,so I hope this one does too.
customer_reviews.author: flower

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to use it for the first time. I had a house full of kids excited to have their hot dogs, but it never heated. We kept it on for hours - plugged, unplugged, plugged it in again...and it never heated. So disappointing. Now, we're beyond the return date and stuck with it not working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fun for events
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons birthday party. It was super easy to use, and made the event great. It did take a long time for the dogs to heat. It was easy to clean, and great to use for family movies night to make it feel more authentic
customer_reviews.author: Audri

customer_reviews.title: Cute hotdog machine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the grandkids for the fourth. It is very cute, but I do not eat hotdogs so can not give a totally honest opinion. The kids liked it. It is a little slow but it was fun. Only used it one time but will use next time they come.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Not great at actually cooking the hot dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, thought it would be like a professional vendor might have. Not really, burns some, others are cold in the middle. Sad because the kids were excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We love this hotdog cooker, easy to use... we have cooked brats, hotdogs and even breakfast links. Plan on trying some other round items such as spring rolls. The nice touch is the top bun warmer. We just wrap the bun in a paper towel and it comes out warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: D. D.

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun Appliance to Cook Hot Dogs .
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a fun appliance, We cooked hot dogs in 15-20 min , We lined the top with foil . The buns were warm / toasted but not dry . Our gran got a big kick out of it
customer_reviews.author: John Celestre

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Makes great hot dogs and sausage. Won't make breakfast sausage links. I wish the rolling bars were closer together to make small breakfast sausage links.
customer_reviews.author: revdrea

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Produces juicy plump hotdogs. Takes a while to cook though. About 15 to 20 minutes. If you cook them too long they will split open and fall between the rollers causing them to stick to the metal cooker underneath. Good thing is that you can pull apart and clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Hot dogs didn’t turn good, especially in the beginning. The steamer on top for the buns doesn’t really work.
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: Cool hot dog machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for an older coworker. He and his wife seem to really enjoy using this cooker at their cottage! He has told me it is a good product and it works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: NateG125

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very excited when the Hot Dog Roller was delivered. It had arrived right before the game perfect, wrong. The Hot Dog Roller did not come with the canopy poles, and we were not able to get the pieces, so we sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveYouMore

customer_reviews.title: What a great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews for this "roller dog" machine and decided to give it a try. It is a great product for the money. I bought this as a gift for someone who LOVES roller dogs! We have been completely satisfied with this product. The rollers and the drip tray are made of excellent quality. It's easy to clean. The recipient of this gift absolutely loves it, and friends that see it in action think it is the coolest thing they've ever seen. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Big Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 🌭
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite items in my sports man cave. I didn’t know how much better hot dogs and sausages can taste cooked liked this. Easy to clean, slow cooks evenly, and warms buns. My buddy just bought one for himself after seeing mine. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jonesboy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use at my sons graduation. A big hit. We now use all the time for hotdogs. They really do turn out tasting better!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: HOT DOGS....COME AND GET YOUR HOT DOGS
customer_reviews.text: Love this takes me back to the days of the fairs or the soda fountains. I love it. It works great. The bun warmer is great also. And cooks the hot dogs perfect and no big mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie C.

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, I used it for my 7 year old son for his Traditional party in his class, and parents bring potlucks but my line was mine, they loved eating hotdogs, also good size and looking beautiful.👍❤
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for my families backyard movie nights . I put four jumbo hot dogs on as I set up and they are cooked and ready to eat in 15 min. I put four more on the rollers and the machine keeps them warm thru the movie. I'm not sure you could fit eight dogs on the rollers as the description says I have cooked everything from regular dogs to kabasa and any more than four the dogs hit each other as they roll. The rollers and drip tray pull out for easy cleaning. After several uses I have no complaints. great purchase
customer_reviews.author: aeval

customer_reviews.title: Does not work like they say it will work, don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Hot dogs get stuck and don’t turn and I had room temperature buns and they never warmed, glad I didn’t butter them, terrible product so not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Not as appears in the photo. It looks similar except it's yellow and red color themed. Looks less impressive than the chrome and red on the photo. None the less it works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooks hot dogs perfect but the bun warmer is for looks...
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our football tailgate. If you have a large crowd this isn't the cooker for you. If you buy hot dogs from Costco then only plan on cooking 4 at a time. The bun warmer only managed to dry out the buns without warming them much. We figure since it is made out of plastic you wouldn't want it too much closer to the heat anyway. The dogs cooked perfectly and the clean up was a breeze since you can pop out the rollers and slide out the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You may want to buy two, sometimes one isn’t enough.
customer_reviews.text: We use this every chance we get. It breaks down fast and it’s easy to reassemble. The bun warmer has a tendency to dry out buns. If you put a damp paper towel down under the buns, they steam up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jon3

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Cooks the hotdogs perfectly and easy to clean. Great for party’s and everyday use. Kids thinks it cool.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Hevia

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, but be sure to eat hot after 25 min; if you reduce temp to keep warm they become cold instead. The bun warmer could be better. Easy to clean, tastier dogs than other cooking methods.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Makes great tasting dogs. Can't really make more than four dogs at a time, recommend you wrap buns in foil for best result. Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Ray pazornick

customer_reviews.title: It holds eight hot dogs but it ends up pushing ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds eight hot dogs but it ends up pushing one hot dog off the roller. The rollers squeak all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Happy daughter
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughter..she was thrilled when it arrived and loves it. Arrived quick in great condition..no complaints
customer_reviews.author: arod56

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before and loved it. My daughter couldn't wait for me to put her a hot dog on there.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small gatherings
customer_reviews.text: Works great except for the bun warmer. No matter how I wrapped them, they dried out. I ended up taking the bun warmer off since it did t work great. And with it on, it is a little hard to get the hot dogs off without dropping an occasional dog!
customer_reviews.author: HittMom

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised, nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: This is a unit I have been looking to obtain for some time. Now that I have it, it does exceed my expectations. It cooks hot dogs perfectly, is easy to use, and clean. The price was reasonable and as always, Amazon delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Fellows

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: bun warmer does not really work, have to cook hotdogs for atleast 10 min.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best machine for that perfect hotdog!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this hot dog machine! Makes the best hot dogs!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Messier

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use. Cooked the hotdogs perfect! No need to Hoover around and watch it. Afterwards it was easy to clean too! Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Creates a great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love making hotdogs on the roller. Gives them a better flavor ! The bun storage at the top only makes then buns hard, not warm and soft, like you’d want them to be.
customer_reviews.author: Brant W

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball Park Taste
customer_reviews.text: Warms fast, cooks Hot Dogs great, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Rollers don't seem to heat evenly
customer_reviews.text: It's more for looks, but also does cook a few hot dogs as well.
customer_reviews.author: docb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine does exactly what it says it will do... It makes excellent hot dogs and polish sausages for the family... to fully cook a link it takes approx 10mins... (Honestly)... I also have the Nostalgia PopCorn Maker.. and will soon purchase the cotton candy machine in addition to the snow cone maker as well... very well pleased... will use this product during the summer and winter... for those busy and stressful days Note: If the hot dogs are the jumbo size.. simply turn them with a fork to get them rolling.. other than that.... PERFECT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: First saw this at a party and loved the cocktail wieners..had to buy it for myself! Am very happy I did...just got done making weight watchers low cal spring rolls on it and they were delicious...think outside the box for egg rolls or taco rolllups to save calories!!! not just for hotdogs!! It's is also cute in my retro kitchen! don't listen to the other reviews that don't like it! they are crazy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cea JaysTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Hot Dogs
customer_reviews.text: We use this for any type of hot dog, sausage, wurst, and it cooks them very evenly and tastes great. I even had huge links and bratwursts on this thing and man they taste great. Clean up is easy and a since. We love this product at home. The bun warmer can only hold maybe 3 complete set of buns. The rollers can do 5-7 hot dogs, 4 wursts, or 3 large sausages. Plus this thing looks cool and all our friends and their kids love to cook on it. Just fun and delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Valle

customer_reviews.title: Defective product.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! I had to disassemble the unit to tighten the screws that held in the motor assembly that turned the rollers. Before that, the drive pin in the roller assembly could not stay in the drive slot. I was so enamored with this hot dog roller, I sent one to my grandchildren. I hope theirs works better.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. K. Tsuffis

customer_reviews.title: Very slow cooking device!
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to clean and to assemble. Takes too long to cook hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great hot dog warmer!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this at least once a week and absolutely love it. The bun warmer uses the rising heat to warm the buns and they come out too toasty. I don't like this feature and don't use it and simply put my buns in a zip lock bag and microwave them. The hot dogs come out perfect and I highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a hot dog warmer. You must watch the hot dogs from over heating, but it on high temp for about 20 minutes, then lower it halfway for an awesome hot dog....
customer_reviews.author: Ggeorgie

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: The hot dog warming part of the appliance is great and easy to use but the bun warmer part is not usable. It just makes the buns hard and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quick and very hot. Cooks perfectly! It's a little strange the drip pan goes below the heating elements so grease can drip on them, but it seems to drip between them anyway. Super cheap plastic, but can't complain for the price. The bun warmer is nothing more than slots in the top that get heat from the heating elements below the hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Good hotdog cooker
customer_reviews.text: I've used this only once but it was fun and did a good job of cooking the hotdogs, looking forward to using it more this summer
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Lindekugel

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the gas station & sporting event hotdogs at home. Delicious!! Kids can use it without danger of burning down the house. Will hold a 8 pack of regular hotdogs.
customer_reviews.author: Mandie M.

customer_reviews.title: So far it is working perfect for an office environment and everyone in the office ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone. So far it is working perfect for an office environment and everyone in the office is enjoying the roller dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Power light doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: My power light does not work. Tried two different power sources.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for parties
customer_reviews.text: Cooks hot dogs perfectly- ( don’t over cook them!) The digs come out evenly heated and juicy!
customer_reviews.author: David Bisciotti

customer_reviews.title: Great hot dog warmer
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I wanted ,however it came with a defective part (the roller attachment) when I called the company they immediately mailed me a new part and it is working as it should. Love the hot dog cooker for football gatherings as the dogs stay hot w/o drying out. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: smedley clinton

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Takes to lo long for the hot dog to finish
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Chernisky

customer_reviews.title: Size issue
customer_reviews.text: It could be longer. Anything other than standard hotdogs and it won't cook 8.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: hot dogs
customer_reviews.text: only used once so far, but maybe it will be better next time
customer_reviews.author: leharrellsr

customer_reviews.title: But a friend has one and I saw how it worked and I loved the way the hot dogs taste
customer_reviews.text: Have not used mine yet. But a friend has one and I saw how it worked and I loved the way the hot dogs taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Plater

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The rollers stick after 2nd use even with washing, I lightly oiled them and seems to work alot better..its very adorable and everyone loves the appearance
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works only on high
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and tried it out I thought it was going to be really cool. It works well on high only. There is supposed to be a med and even a low but this is not true. I returned the first one thinking it may have been defective replaced it with a second one and still the same thing. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease
customer_reviews.text: I love hot dogs!!! Used it the day after I got it, used some green wise smoked chicken sausages and they were stupendous!!!! Easy clean up also, thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Brie Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim and it is a huge hit ! Everyone is home and I thought it might be fun to try something different. It works beautifully and evenly cooks the dogs or sausages and it’s fun for the kids. The big and little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Weezie

customer_reviews.title: Great little Hot Dog Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Great little Hot Dog Cooker! We have used it several times, make 8 regular size Dogs at a time in about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Pro

customer_reviews.title: Great hot dog griller......great nostalgic look !
customer_reviews.text: Love the look......grills hot dogs and bun length sausage very well. Only reason it didn't get 5 stars was the so called top bun warmer that doesn't work at all.......best it does it dry out the buns.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Its underpowered
customer_reviews.text: I tried to like the product, believe me, but it does not heat enough to make your hot dogs cook as they should. It comes with a drip tray and I have never needed to clean it. It just warms the hot dogs. No matter the size, they dont cook well enough, Its way under powered.
customer_reviews.author: George R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the office and everyone is loving it. It's easy to use and clean. If I have one complaint it would be that the buns get dried out in the bun warmer.
customer_reviews.author: odaymd

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my hot dog son
customer_reviews.text: It does work; but my hot dog lover son usually requires more than just 2 hot dogs when he decides on that meal (which is a toss between pizza and hot dogs on a weekly basis). But he also wants a warm bun and this does not steam a bun and, sometimes, even a fatter hot dog. It works like it is advertised; but is just too small.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for roller items. But the bun warmer is useless. Buns get hard fast
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Rating not right on this item
customer_reviews.text: My rating on this item isn’t right because they were gifts and were sent back.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia Electrics RHD800 Retro Series Hot Dog Roller
customer_reviews.text: This works well for my purposes. It evenly cooks hot dogs in about 15 to 20 minutes. I have cooked Italian sausage and it takes longer. It has a heating element and drip pan below the rollers. The drip pan and rollers both come out for easy cleaning. I have never used the top for heating buns.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Mulvihill

customer_reviews.title: Great for bratwurst!
customer_reviews.text: First one I got had damage to the rollers. Second one I got performed great! I use it primarily for bratwurst. I do not use the bun warmer at the top as it doesn't really warm the buns all that well. This easily disassembles for cleaning and is easily put back together. I only hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: A. Spade

customer_reviews.title: Great for hotdog-lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is great as a gift for someone who REALLY loves hotdogs, but it is slow to cook and will not get hotdogs nearly as hot as a pan or grill will. However, that gives you the benefit of not worrying if your house will burn down if you leave it unattended and of ensuring an even cook.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for party young and old
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook on here for easy clean up and good flavor hotdogs
customer_reviews.author: Stacey wymore

customer_reviews.title: The setup of the hotdog maker was very easy.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the hotdog maker, it is very light weight, easy to clean, the hotdog actually taste really good like out of a restaurant, and it can just slide into a small area when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The loving it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. You just have to eat weiners as soon as their done or they schribble up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use when friends and guests are over. The bun warmer works nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nate C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but. . .
customer_reviews.text: This would work well for regular size hot dogs but we always use huge jumbo ones made of pork and chicken. Because it would only cook two at a time and the dogs were twice the size of normal ones it took an hour and twenty minutes to cook four dogs. Not the machine's fault but Amazon was very understanding about it.
customer_reviews.author: B. King

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties or just any night..
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits about 7 smaller hot dogs great when having lots kids over .. my family loves it
customer_reviews.author: Erica Crain

customer_reviews.title: Wanna dog?
customer_reviews.text: Now some of the cheapest hot dogs you can buy taste awesome. My husband loves this and so do I. Gives the hot dogs great flavor. Cooks them all the way thru, easy to clean and even has a bun warmer on top.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Steele

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is such a piece of junk. So cheaply made and hardly works. Takes forever to heat up and buns end up being dry and crumbly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COOKS A DOG TO PREFECTION
customer_reviews.text: if you love hotdogs or you have kids in your household...BUY IT!!! you will be most pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: it will dry the buns out if you leave them to long in the bun warmer
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect hotdogs machine. The size is perfect and it makes the Best Hot Dogs ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy maintenance. Only problem it is a little slow cooking hotdogs but would recommend for easy care.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Sims

customer_reviews.title: used for work
customer_reviews.text: everybody LOVES the hot dogs cooked on this - they all look forward to HOT DOG DAY
customer_reviews.author: a happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Party favorite
customer_reviews.text: Silly Christmas gift for my husband has become a total hit with the friends!!! Works great, easy to clean, buns get a little toasty in the top so they only need to be up there for a short time. But seriously SO happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: kayte marchese

customer_reviews.title: Hotdog review
customer_reviews.text: It takes like 1/2 hour to make the hotdogs. But they cook all the way through. The only problem you can only cook 4 at a time. Love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Weintraub

customer_reviews.title: great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about this at the beginning, but turned out I was wrong, great little machine, easy to use and clean, does exactly what I want it to do. I use this now instead of the boiling {which I can't stand} I'm very glad I bought this one, perfect for the three of us. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: I. Koch

product_meta.title: Nostalgia RHD800 Hot Dog Roller and Bun Warmer, 8 Hot Dog and 6 Bun Capacity
product_meta.description: Style:OriginalBring the family togetherwhile making meal time simple. Cooks eight regular-sized or four foot-long hot dogs at a time. The stainless steel rollers continuously rotate to evenly cook hot dogs, while the adjustable heat settings makes cooking hot dogs simple and quick. The stylish canopy doubles as a bun warmer, holding up to 6 buns at a time. Take snack or meal time to the next level.
feature_bullets: Cooks up to 8 delicious regular-size or 4 foot-long hot dogs at a time
Continuously rotating stainless steel rollers cook hot dogs
Bun warmer in canopy holds up to 6 buns at a time
NOTE: Refer the User Manual before use.
